dia.str: I found you a human skull.
You have indeed. I'm proud of you. But I need one last thing from you before I'll teach you.
Just tell me what do I need to do.
Don't be rude, or I might change my mind. Find me the cape of a warlock. It can be in bad condition, it does not matter.

There are crypts all around this area. Necromancers used this place for hundreds of years, so that is no surprise. They need to honour their dead, too. I think your best chance is in one of those crypts.
